targets.query: SELECT top("uptime_format", 1) FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("available_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

model.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

targets.query: SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(total) AS "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "path" = '/jodlis' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(total) AS "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "path" = '/jodlis' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("io_service_bytes_recursive_read"), 1s) as "read" FROM "docker_container_blkio" WHERE engine_host = 'snes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("io_service_bytes_recursive_write"), 1s) as "write" FROM "docker_container_blkio" WHERE engine_host = 'snes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(rx_bytes),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tx_bytes),1s)*8 as "out"  FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

model.query: SELECT mean("average_response_ms") as "average_response_ms" FROM "ping" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("average_response_ms") as "average_response_ms" FROM "ping" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
